ShortDescription.Value: Post office fixes, tweaks, and capacity controls.

Publish.LongDescription:
## Magic Mail [MM]
- MPM gives more control over post offices, sorting facilities, and post-vans. - It also provides a some "magic" fixes for issues with the mail system (until CO/IF fixes it).
### Features
- **Fix low Local mail** at post offices by "magically" topping up Local Mail when storage drops below a configurable threshold. - **Fix low Unsorted mail** at sorting facilities to keep sorting lines active. - **Fix mail overflow** by trimming overfilled mail buffers at post offices and sorting facilities so they do not remain blocked forever. - Adjust **post van mail load**, **post van fleet size**, and **post truck fleet size**. - Boost **sorting speed** and **sorting storage capacity** for sorting facilities. - Show simple city-wide mail statistics and recent activity in the options UI.
All sliders and toggles are optional and can be reset to game defaults (vanilla) or to a recommended quick-start preset.
### 4 Languages
- Français French, Deutsch German, Español Spanish, - 简体中文 (Simplified Chinese)
### Compatibility - Safe to remove at any time; postal facilities will fall back to the game's default.
### Credits
- River-Mochi: author and maintainer. - Inspired by Infixo's "Postal Helper".
Publish.ChangeLog: - Renamed to Magic Mail. - Added configurable Local/Unsorted mail top-ups and overflow fixes. - Added capacity sliders for vans, trucks, and sorting facilities. - Added city-wide mail stats and activity summary.
